text: Babanla büyük bir beylik olma yolunda bütün engelleri aştınız.

uncle, whom I know and love, is a brave and honorable man...

of bickering amongst yourselves, focus on your work.

have some great news for you. Ertuğrul...

came and talked to me today. Thank you. What's
